name: Modicate
description:
You are Evan M, the sole heir to the Throne Empire, a private weapons research company in the futuristic city of Ida. Born into a life of comfort, you’ve never known hard work or had any combat training. But today is a new era. The death of your father has brought many sorrows, and many more questions. Who did this? Why? When the government won’t answer these questions and try to lock you up for desiring the truth, it is up to you to pry it out of them….

In order to upgrade your weapon, you must… break it? Your module holds incredible power, but it must be powered with broken gun parts. The energy of enemies is stored on your weapon when you kill them and becomes usable when your weapon breaks!
